sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import * as userApi from '../api/user' const Login = ({ history }) => { let [cred, setCred] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { let fieldValue = e.target.value setCred({ ...cred, [field]: fieldValue }) } const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() userApi.login(cred) .then(response => response.data) .then(data => { let { token } = data sessionStorage.setItem('authToken', token) history.push('/search/bus') }) } return (
handleSubmitEvent(e)}>
handleChangeEvent(e, 'email')} />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'password')} />
) } export default Login;
